main event: Unidentified flying object observed in Tierra Amarilla, New Mexico on May 20, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed on radar, appearing as three targets on two radar scopes.
The object was tracked for approximately 40 seconds, moving at a speed of around 1,800 mph.
The radar operators who observed the object were considered to be very reliable and trustworthy.
The sighting was reported to higher command, including the Director of Intelligence at USAF headquarters.
The report indicates that the sighting warranted further scrutiny as a possible unidentified aerial object.
